subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Football
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Concussions
Research
Brain
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. linebacker Junior Seau had chronic traumatic encephalopathy when he committed suicide last spring, the National Institutes of Health said Thursday.
snippet: The former N.F.L. linebacker Junior Seau had chronic traumatic encephalopathy when he committed suicide last spring, the National Institutes of Health said Thursday.
